name: Spider Legs
description: A horrifying yet useful mixture of necromancy and artificing.

abilities.name: Skitter
abilities.description: Grants the caster movement speed, improved turn rate, and free pathing for some time.
notes: Interrupts the caster's channeling abilities upon cast
Allows the user to walk through units, buildings, cliffs, and trees
Walking over trees causes them to be destroyed
When crafted with the Dormant Curio, the movement speed bonus is increased by 30%

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
